TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Animals[COLOR_REVERT] hunt unprotected settlers! Beware!!
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]野兽[COLOR_REVERT]时常袭击没有保护的移民！当心！

TEXT.English: Build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settlers[COLOR_REVERT] to expand your empire with new cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]移民[COLOR_REVERT]建立新城市，扩张你的文明。

TEXT.English: Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT] to improve the land around your cities and build roads that help establish trade routes.
TEXT.Chinese: 使用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]在城市周围改造地块，并修建道路方便贸易的开展。

TEXT.English: Build the special Indian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fast Worker[COLOR_REVERT] to construct roads and railroads and to improve your land. It can move further than regular workers, allowing it to move and carry out an action on the same turn.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建印度的特色单位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]印度工人[COLOR_REVERT]修建道路并改造地块。相比普通工人具有更高的移动力，可在同一回合内进行移动并开展工作。

TEXT.English: Build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scouts[COLOR_REVERT] when you want to explore new territory; they get better results from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tribal Villages[COLOR_REVERT]. However, they cannot attack other units.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]以探索未知地域；探访[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]部落村庄[COLOR_REVERT]时能获得更好的收获。但是他们不能用于攻击。

TEXT.English: Build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorers[COLOR_REVERT] to explore uncharted territory more quickly than [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scouts[COLOR_REVERT] can; they get better results from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tribal Villages[COLOR_REVERT]. They cannot attack other units.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_REVERT]探索未知地域，相比[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]移动力更高；探访[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]部落村庄[COLOR_REVERT]时能获得更好的收获。但是他们不能用于攻击。

TEXT.English: Build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spies[COLOR_REVERT] to explore anywhere even in enemy territory. Keep some in your own territory to uncover spies your opponents have sent to explore your lands.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]查探所有地域甚至是敌方领土。在本国领土也要放置一些以发现敌方派遣的间谍。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所罗门圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Nativity[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]基督教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣诞大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克尔白天房[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kashi Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教黄金殿[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大菩提寺[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Miao[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孔庙[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Use this missionary to actively spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]). This increases your income if you have the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dai Miao[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]岱庙[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Build this melee combat unit for quick, early defense for your cities or as escorts for your defenseless [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settlers[COLOR_REVERT]. This unit is cheap to produce but weak so you will want to make better units as soon as you are able.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建这种肉搏单位用于早期的城防，或护卫你的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]移民[COLOR_REVERT]。组建成本较低但战斗力较弱，不可作为长久之计。

TEXT.English: The special Incan melee combat unit; it gets a big bonus when fighting archery units.
TEXT.Chinese: 印加的特色肉搏单位；对投射单位具有优势加成。

TEXT.English: You should build this powerful early melee combat unit when you want to attack cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是强大的早期肉搏单位，适合进攻城市。

TEXT.English: This powerful melee combat unit (the Aztec replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT]) is special because it requires no special reource and gets a bonus in [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jungles[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这是阿兹特克的特色肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]），不需要拥有特殊资源，在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]地形具有优势加成。

TEXT.English: This powerful melee combat unit (the Roman replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT]) is special because it gets a substantial strength boost.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是罗马的特色肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]），具有特殊战斗优势加成。

TEXT.English: Build this melee combat unit to counter other melee units as it gets a boost against them.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种肉搏单位在对付其他肉搏单位时具有特殊战斗优势加成。

TEXT.English: Build this melee combat unit to counter other melee units as it gets a boost against them.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种肉搏单位在对付其他肉搏单位时具有特殊战斗优势加成。

TEXT.English: This powerful melee combat unit (the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maceman[COLOR_REVERT]) is special because it gets 2 first strikes and it is particularly effective against other melee units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是日本的特色肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]钉锤手[COLOR_REVERT]），具有2个先发打击点数，特别适用于对付其他肉搏单位。

TEXT.English: Build this early melee combat unit as a counter to an enemy building lots of mounted units.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建此类早期肉搏单位用于对付大量骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: This powerful melee combat unit (the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT]) gets a bonus against mounted units and is adept at hill defense..
TEXT.Chinese: 这是希腊的特色肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]），对骑乘单位具有优势加成，适用于丘陵地形的防守。

TEXT.English: This melee combat unit gets a big bonus when fighting mounted enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种肉搏单位对骑乘单位具有特殊优势加成。

TEXT.English: This early gunpowder unit requires no special resources and is good for defending cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期的火器部队不需要特殊资源，适于用来防御城市。

TEXT.English: This early gunpowder combat unit (the French replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT]) is faster than other non-mounted units at this stage of the game.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期的火器近战部队（法国用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]）比同时代其他非骑乘单位的移动能力要高一些。

TEXT.English: Build this moderate-strength gunpowder unit as a counter against mounted enemies like [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 训练这种中等战力的火器部队可以有效地对抗[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]等骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: This powerful gunpowder combat unit (the English replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT]) gets a bonus against mounted units and other gunpowder units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的火器近战部队（英国用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]来复枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]）在攻击骑乘单位及其他火器部队时可以得到一定加成。

TEXT.English: Build this moderate-strength gunpowder unit as a counter to an enemy with lots of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 训练这种中等战力的火器部队可以有效地对抗拥有大量[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]来复枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]的部队。

TEXT.English: This unit is the first modern era soldier. Use it to counter enemies with lots of gunpowder units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种部队是第一种现代军事单位，可以对抗大量火器部队。

TEXT.English: These gunpowder combat units are armed with surface-to-air missiles, giving them bonuses versus aircraft and choppers. Stack them with units vulnerable to air attack.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种火器近战部队装备有地对空导弹，这使他们在同飞行器和直升机作战时获得加成。可以将它们与易受空中打击的其他部队部署在一起。

TEXT.English: Build this strong modern infantry unit to counter [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Guns[COLOR_REVERT]. It starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion so use them from ships and across rivers.
TEXT.Chinese: 训练这种强大的现代步兵可对抗[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]炮兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重机枪[COLOR_REVERT]。它天生拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]两栖作战[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，因此可以用它们从船上攻击，或跨河攻击。

TEXT.English: This powerful modern infantry unit (the American replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marine[COLOR_REVERT]) gets a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Guns[COLOR_REVERT]. It starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的现代陆战单位（美国用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]海军陆战队[COLOR_REVERT]）在对抗[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火炮[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重机枪[COLOR_REVERT]时可获得加成奖励。它天生具有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]两栖作战[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]长途行军[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: This is the strongest gunpowder unit. It moves faster than the other infantry units and it has a chance of intercepting enemy aircraft. It starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion
TEXT.Chinese: 最强大的火器部队。较其他步兵移动更快，有一定几率拦截对方的飞行器。天生具有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]长途行军[COLOR_REVERT]晋升

TEXT.English: This primitive ranged unit is a great early choice for defending your cities from attack. It gets a first strike chance and gets defensive bonuses in cities and on hills.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种原始的射击部队是最初期用来防御你的城市的明智选择。它有机会获得1个先发打击点数，在城市和丘陵地带可获得额外防御加成。

TEXT.English: This early combat unit (the Mali replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT]) is a great early choice for city and hill defense.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期近战部队（马里用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓箭手[COLOR_REVERT]）非常适合用于城市和丘陵的防御。

TEXT.English: This strong archery unit gets a bonus when defending in cities or on hills. Build them to replace your obsolete [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Skirmishers[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的投射部队在防御城市和丘陵时可获得一定防御加成。训练它们来取代你过时的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓箭手[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]马里突击手[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: A strong archery unit that gets a bonus when fighting melee units. Stack them with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikemen[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Macemen[COLOR_REVERT] for a dangerous combined-arms force.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是一种强大的投射部队，在对抗肉搏部队时获有加成。将这些部队与[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]钉锤手[COLOR_REVERT]混编时可获得很强的综合战力。

TEXT.English: This powerful archery combat unit (the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman[COLOR_REVERT]) gets 2 first strikes, collateral damage, and a bonus versus melee units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是一种非常强大的投射部队（中国用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手[COLOR_REVERT]）具有2个先发打击点数，附带损伤能力，并有对肉搏单位的战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Build this most primitive of the mounted combat units when speed is important but stay on the offensive as it gets no defensive bonuses.
TEXT.Chinese: 当你关注行军的速度时，可以训练这种最原始的骑乘单位，但记住使他们一直保持进攻，因为它们无法获得防御加成。

TEXT.English: This early mounted combat unit (the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT]) is immune to first strikes but gets no defensive bonuses.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期的骑乘单位（埃及用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车[COLOR_REVERT]）可以无视敌人的先发打击，但无法获得防御加成。

TEXT.English: This mounted combat unit (the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT]) is more effective than the chariot against archery units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期的骑乘单位（波斯用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车[COLOR_REVERT]）较战车能更为有效地对抗弓箭部队。

TEXT.English: This mounted unit is very powerful for early in the game and is a great counter to an enemy with catapults.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种骑乘单位在早期是十分强大的，尤其擅长对抗装备投石机的敌军部队。

TEXT.English: This powerful mounted combat unit (the Mongol replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT]) is extremely fast because it ignores terrain movement costs. It is an excellent counter to enemy catapults.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的骑乘单位（蒙古用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手[COLOR_REVERT]）速度非常快，因为它无视移动的地形损失。是对抗敌人投石机部队的上佳之选。

TEXT.English: This is the strongest pre-gunpowder unit in the game and are quite effective until [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadiers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] begin appearing.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种部队是游戏中火器时代之前最强大的部队，直到[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]掷弹兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]出现之前，都是战场上最强大的。

TEXT.English: This powerful mounted combat unit (the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT]) is very powerful until the introduction of gunpowder units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的骑乘单位（阿拉伯用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]）在火器部队出现前都非常强大。

TEXT.English: This powerful mounted combat unit (the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT]) gets a bonus when attacking melee units and gets terrain defense bonuses, unlike the Knight and Camel Archer.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的骑乘单位（西班牙用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]）在攻击肉搏部队时拥有加成，并且可以获得地形防御加成，这不同与骑士和骆驼骑射手。

TEXT.English: This most powerful mounted unit is particularly effective in open terrain and can withdraw from combat. It receives a bonus when attacking [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] but receives no terrain bonuses when defending.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种最强大的骑乘单位特别适于用于探索地形，并能从战斗中撤退。在攻击[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]时拥有奖励加成，但不能获得防御时的地形奖励。

TEXT.English: This Russian [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] unit enjoys a large advantage against other mounted units and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种俄国版的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]部队在对其他骑乘单位作战时很有优势，也擅长对抗[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: This powerful early mounted combat unit is a slower, but more powerful counter to units like the Horse Archer.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期骑乘作战单位速度较慢，但比骑射手等单位更强大。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tank[COLOR_REVERT] is a magnificent offensive weapon. It has a movement of 2 and can attack twice a turn. Tanks can hunt down and destroy pre-modern-era units at will but receive no terrain bonuses when defending.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]坦克[COLOR_REVERT]是很有效的进攻武器。它有2点移动力，并能在同一回合中攻击两次。坦克能轻易击溃任意现代之前出现的单位，但在防守时没有地形加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Panzer[COLOR_REVERT] is the German replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tank[COLOR_REVERT] and gets a bonus when fighting other tanks.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]德国坦克[COLOR_REVERT]是德国的特色单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]坦克[COLOR_REVERT]），在攻击普通坦克时占有优势。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Modern Armor[COLOR_REVERT] units are extremely powerful offensive weapons. Warlike leaders should build them early and often.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]主战坦克[COLOR_REVERT]是极强大的进攻武器。好战的领袖们必须尽早的大量组建这种单位。

TEXT.English: These helicopter units are very fast and quite lethal against armored units. Use them to soften up the enemy but you will have to use a land-based unit to capture cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种旋翼单位行动迅速，是装甲部队的天敌。你可以用它们迟滞敌军，但你仍需依靠地面部队占领城市。

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard enemy city fortifications and has a chance to withdraw from combat when losing. When attacking another unit, they cause collateral damage to other enemy units sharing the target's space.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石车[COLOR_REVERT]可以轰击敌方城防，当战斗失败时也有一定几率可安全撤退。当投石车攻击时，会对和目标处于同一位置的其他单位造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard enemy city fortifications and have a chance to withdraw from combat when losing. When attacking another unit, they cause collateral damage to other enemy units sharing the target's space.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]可以轰击敌方城防，当战斗失败时也有一定几率可安全撤退。当投石车攻击时，会对和目标处于同一位置的其他单位造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Guns[COLOR_REVERT] are powerful defensive weapons, especially against enemy gunpowder units. These units cannot initiate attacks, making them most useful when defending cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重机枪[COLOR_REVERT]是有力的防御武器，尤其是在对付敌方的火器单位时。重机枪部队不能发起攻击，因此通常被用于守卫城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] units are very effective at attacking enemy cities; they can bombard enemy city fortifications and have a chance to withdraw from combat when losing. They also cause collateral damage to other enemy units sharing the target's space.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火炮[COLOR_REVERT]在攻击敌方城市时非常有效；它们可以轰击敌方城防，当战斗失败时也有一定几率可安全撤退。同时,和火炮也会对与目标处于同一位置的其他敌军造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: Unarmed vessels that can create fishing boats, whaling boats, and (in late game) oil rigs. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT] cannot enter Ocean spaces.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种非武装船只可用于建造渔船、捕鲸船和海上平台（游戏后期）。[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工船[COLOR_REVERT]不能进入大洋。

TEXT.English: The earliest armed naval vessel, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleys[COLOR_REVERT] can transport 2 land units. They cannot enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.Chinese: 最早出现的武装船只，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]桨帆船[COLOR_REVERT]能运载两个地面单位。桨帆船不能进入大洋。

TEXT.English: This small and fast ship can explore oceans and rival territory. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] can transport one special unit - [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scout[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionary[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种小型快速帆船能探索大洋和敌方区域。[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻帆船[COLOR_REVERT]可以运载一个特殊单位——[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]或者[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleon[COLOR_REVERT] is the best transport of the age of sail. It can carry 3 units, and it can safely enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大帆船[COLOR_REVERT]是大航海时代最好的运输船。它可以运载三个单位，并能安全地出入大洋。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigate[COLOR_REVERT] is the most powerful wooden ship in the game. It can sink enemy shipping and bombard enemy city fortifications.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三桅战舰[COLOR_REVERT]是游戏中最强大的木制战舰。它能击沉敌舰并炮轰敌方海滨城防。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclad[COLOR_REVERT] is very slow, but powerful. It can bombard enemy city fortifications but cannot enter ocean spaces.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]铁甲舰[COLOR_REVERT]速度缓慢而强大。它能炮击敌方城防但不能进入大洋。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Transport[COLOR_REVERT] is a cargo ship. It can carry up to 4 units and can enter ocean spaces but is extremely vulnerable to planes and modern warships.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输舰[COLOR_REVERT]能运载四个单位，并可以出入大洋。但是运输舰无法抵御飞机和现代战舰的攻击。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] have a small chance of intercepting enemy aircraft and also are very good at spotting and destroying enemy [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] (which are invisible to most other units). They are often stacked with [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carriers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Transport[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]有一定的防空作用，而且还能很好的探测并摧毁敌方[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_REVERT]（对其他大多数单位隐形）。它们通常与[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输舰[COLOR_REVERT]一起行动。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Battleships[COLOR_REVERT] are the most powerful warships afloat. They can sink most other vessels they meet (though they are vulnerable to submarine and air attack). Further, when attacking, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Battleships[COLOR_REVERT] cause collateral damage to other enemy naval units sharing the target's space. They can also bombard enemy city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战列舰[COLOR_REVERT]是最强的水面舰艇。战列舰能击沉大多数舰只（但对潜艇和空袭却显得无能为力）。类似的，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战列舰[COLOR_REVERT]的攻击也会对目标同一位置的其他单位造成附带损害。战列舰也能轰击城防。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] are invisible to most units. They can explore rival territory and can carry special units, but are vulnerable to enemy [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] and other subs.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_REVERT]对大多数单位隐身。它们能探索敌方区域并运载特殊单位，但易遭受敌方[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]和其他潜艇的攻击。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carriers[COLOR_REVERT] are moderately-powerful naval units in themselves, but their primary ability is to carry up to three [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT]. These fighters can defend the stack against enemy aircraft, they can scout terrain, and they can attack enemy units and cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]本身只有中等战力，但它们的主要作用是运载三架[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]。战斗机可用于防空、侦察、轰炸敌方部队和城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighter[COLOR_REVERT] units can attack enemy air units and can scout enemy terrain. They are very useful when stationed on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carrier[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]可攻击敌方空军单位并侦察敌方领土，当其被配置在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]上时非常有用。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jet Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] have greater range than regular [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT], and they are better at intercepting and destroying enemy aircraft.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]喷气式战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]比普通[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]的作战范围更大，也能更有效的拦截敌方空军。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] are land-based aircraft. They can attack enemy land units (and sea units, but not very effectively), and they can weaken enemy city fortifications. Bombers cause collateral damage when attacking.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]是陆基航空兵。它们可以攻击敌军地面部队（也能攻击水面部队，但效果略差），也能破坏敌军城防。轰炸机也会造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] can attack enemy land units (and sea units, but less effectively). When attacking they cause collateral damage. Stealth bombers are very difficult for enemy aircraft to intercept and shoot down.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]隐形轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]可以攻击敌军地面部队（也能攻击水面部队，但效果略差）。轰炸会造成附带损害。地方空军很难拦截并击落隐形轰炸机。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT] can nuke enemy cities, causing a great deal of damage to buildings, units, and nearby terrain.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战略导弹[COLOR_REVERT]能攻击敌方城市，造成建筑、部队和附近地区的极大损伤。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophets[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to immediately construct a religious [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shrine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]允许你立即建成宗教[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT] can create a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Work[COLOR_REVERT] which provides enormous culture to the host city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]能创作[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术杰作[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市大量积累文化。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientists[COLOR_REVERT] can build an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT], which greatly increases a city's research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]能创立[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科学院[COLOR_REVERT]，极大地增加城市的研发投入。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchants[COLOR_REVERT] can complete a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Trade Mission[COLOR_REVERT] in a foreign city which generates a lot of gold. Try to complete it in really far away cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]能在外国城市开展[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]贸易活动[COLOR_REVERT]，获得大笔金钱收入。外国城市距离本国越远越好。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineers[COLOR_REVERT] can instantly complete a city's active production.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]能立刻完成城市当前的建设项目。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mysticism[COLOR_REVERT] allows [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisks[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT] wonder. It also leads to [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Meditation[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Polytheism[COLOR_REVERT], each of which give the first discoverer a religion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]神秘论[COLOR_REVERT]科技允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨石阵[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。并通向[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]冥想学[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]多神论[COLOR_REVERT]，首先发现这两项科技者将创立相应新宗教。

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monastery[COLOR_REVERT] city improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]。并允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: This first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables you to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]。并允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神庙[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Priesthood[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] in cities (if a religion is present), which increase happiness and culture. It also enables the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]祭司制度[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]建筑（如果存在某种宗教），以提升快乐度和文化值。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Organized Religion[COLOR_REVERT] civic.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]信仰控制[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] allows the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hereditary Rule[COLOR_REVERT] civic, which provides happiness in cities when military units are stationed in them. It also enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wineries[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]君主制[COLOR_REVERT]允许[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]世袭制度[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令，可以通过驻军提升城市快乐度。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]酿酒坊[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Allows you to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] national wonders, as well as the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观。

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT]. It enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caste System[COLOR_REVERT] civic and allows construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chichen Itza[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]。启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]等级社会[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]奇琴伊察[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Drama[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to adjust the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Culture[COLOR_REVERT] slider and enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] as well as the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]戏剧[COLOR_REVERT]允许你调整[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]文化[COLOR_REVERT]滑杆并可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] allows production of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowmen[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT]). It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vassalage[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Serfdom[COLOR_REVERT] civics.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]封建制度[COLOR_REVERT]允许组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长弓手[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]弓箭[COLOR_REVERT]）。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]分封制度[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农奴制度[COLOR_REVERT]法令。

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT]. It enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theocracy[COLOR_REVERT] civic and allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]基督教[COLOR_REVERT]。启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]神权政治[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: The first to research [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Music[COLOR_REVERT] receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedrals[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] wonder. Finally, cities can convert production directly into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Culture[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]音乐[COLOR_REVERT]将获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。此外，城市将可将生产能力直接转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]文化[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: This tech allows you to build powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knight[COLOR_REVERT] units (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horseback Riding[COLOR_REVERT]), as well as the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT] city improvement. It increases production from all workshops by 1.
TEXT.Chinese: 该科技允许你建造强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]单位（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]骑术[COLOR_REVERT]），以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。并使所有工场的产能+1。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Civil Service[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bureaucracy[COLOR_REVERT] civic and allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Macemen[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Machinery[COLOR_REVERT]). Further, it lets your workers spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Irrigation[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]文官制度[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官僚制度[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令并允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]钉锤手[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]机械[COLOR_REVERT]）。此外还可使工人建设[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]灌溉[COLOR_REVERT]设施。

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Divine Right[COLOR_REVERT] also allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]。[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]君权神授论[COLOR_REVERT]还允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Nationalism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nationhood[COLOR_REVERT] civic as well as construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder and the culturally-powerful [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hermitage[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]民族主义[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]民族国家[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观和加强文化积累的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冬宫[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] units (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horseback Riding[COLOR_REVERT]). It enables [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Defensive Pacts[COLOR_REVERT] and construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]军事制度[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]骑术[COLOR_REVERT]）。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]共同防御[COLOR_REVERT]条约和建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西点军校[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: This tech enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Representation[COLOR_REVERT] civic and allows the construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 该科技启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]代议制度[COLOR_REVERT]法令和允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The first to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Liberalism[COLOR_REVERT] receives a free technology. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Free Speech[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Free Religion[COLOR_REVERT] civics.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]自由主义[COLOR_REVERT]的文明可获得一项免费科技。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]言论自由[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]信仰自由[COLOR_REVERT]法令。

TEXT.English: This tech enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Universal Suffrage[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Emancipation[COLOR_REVERT] civics. It allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 该科技启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]普选制度[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]人身自由[COLOR_REVERT]法令。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: Fascism enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Police State[COLOR_REVERT] civic and construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] wonder. It also allows [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Permanent Alliances[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 法西斯主义将启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]强化监控[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令和建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]永久同盟[COLOR_REVERT]外交条约。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional trade route to all cities and enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wall Street[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]公司制[COLOR_REVERT]使所有城市获得额外商路并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Communism[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]State Property[COLOR_REVERT] civic and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Permanent Alliances[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Scotland Yard[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]共产主义[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]国营经济[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]永久同盟[COLOR_REVERT]外交条约。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: This technology allows construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT], as well as the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: 获得该科技将可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Ecology[COLOR_REVERT] allows workers to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scrub Fallout[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables cities to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Center[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]生态学[COLOR_REVERT]允许工人[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]消除辐射[COLOR_REVERT]。并允许城市建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]回收中心[COLOR_REVERT]以及[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船服务舱[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fishing[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT], which can harvest [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crabs[COLOR_REVERT], and other aquatic resources. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fishing[COLOR_REVERT] is also required for cities to use any water tiles.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]渔业[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工船[COLOR_REVERT]，用以获取[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和其他水产资源。[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]渔业[COLOR_REVERT]也使城市可以利用所属水域。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]The Wheel[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT] units. More importantly, it allows your workers to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]轮子[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车[COLOR_REVERT]单位。而且使你的工人可以修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道路[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Agriculture[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT] (but only next to rivers and lakes until discovering [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Civil Service[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]农业[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_REVERT]（但必须邻近河流和湖泊，除非获得[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]文官制度[COLOR_REVERT]）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Pottery[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cottages[COLOR_REVERT], which generate commerce for your civilization. It enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granary[COLOR_REVERT] city improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]制陶[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农舍[COLOR_REVERT]，可提供商业收入。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Sailing[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT] unit. It also enables coastal trading and construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] city improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]航行术[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]桨帆船[COLOR_REVERT]单位。并允许沿海贸易和建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Writing[COLOR_REVERT] enables you to construct [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT], which boost research. It also allows you to sign [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT] trading agreements with other civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]文字[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]，可以促进科研。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]外交条约。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT] building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]数学[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]建筑和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alphabet[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to trade technologies with other civilizations and lets you build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Research[COLOR_REVERT] in cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]字母表[COLOR_REVERT]允许你同其他文明交换科技并允许将城市生产能力转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科研[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Calendar[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Plantation[COLOR_REVERT] improvements, enabling you to access various valuable resources. It obsoletes [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisks[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]历法[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]种植园[COLOR_REVERT]设施，使你可以获取多种有价值的资源。并使[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨石阵[COLOR_REVERT]奇观过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Currency[COLOR_REVERT] adds +1 trade routes per city and allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT]) city improvements. It also enables you to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wealth[COLOR_REVERT] in cities and to trade gold with other civs.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]货币制度[COLOR_REVERT]使每座城市商业+1并允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]行会[COLOR_REVERT]）建筑。并允许你将城市生产能力转化为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]财富[COLOR_REVERT]以及与其他文明进行金钱交易。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT] allows the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigate[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemistry[COLOR_REVERT]) naval units. It enables trading on the ocean and lets you build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatories[COLOR_REVERT]. It obsoletes the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]天文学[COLOR_REVERT]允许[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大帆船[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三桅战舰[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]化学[COLOR_REVERT]）海军单位。并允许远洋贸易和建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]。并使得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]奇观过时。

TEXT.English: The first to research this tech founds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Philosophy[COLOR_REVERT] enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pacifism[COLOR_REVERT] civic and allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Angkor Wat[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现该科技者将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]。[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]哲学[COLOR_REVERT]可启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]和平主义[COLOR_REVERT]内政法令并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to trade world maps with other civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]造纸[COLOR_REVERT]允许你与其他文明交换地图。

TEXT.English: This tech allows you to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT], which greatly increase a city's production of wealth. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Banking[COLOR_REVERT] also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mercantilism[COLOR_REVERT] civic.
TEXT.Chinese: 该科技允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]，可极大增加城市财富。[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]银行业[COLOR_REVERT]还可启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]重商主义[COLOR_REVERT]法令。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Education[COLOR_REVERT] enables the construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] city improvement and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]教育学[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]建筑和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Printing Press[COLOR_REVERT] increases the gold output of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Villages[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Towns[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]印刷机[COLOR_REVERT]可提升[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大村[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小镇[COLOR_REVERT]的金钱收入。

TEXT.English: The first to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Economics[COLOR_REVERT] receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT]. It also enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Free Market[COLOR_REVERT] civic.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]经济学[COLOR_REVERT]的文明可获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]自由市场[COLOR_REVERT]法令。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Scientific Method[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] resource. It makes the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] obsolete.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]科学方法[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]资源。并使得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemistry[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadiers[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigates[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Astronomy[COLOR_REVERT]). It obsoletes the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] and increases production from all workshops by 1.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]化学[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]掷弹兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三桅战舰[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]天文学[COLOR_REVERT]）。并使[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神庙[COLOR_REVERT]过时，还可使工场生产能力+1。

TEXT.English: The first civilization to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Physics[COLOR_REVERT] receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT]. This tech also reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT] resource.
TEXT.Chinese: 首先发现[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]物理学[COLOR_REVERT]的文明可获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]资源。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Biology[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT] without [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Irrigation[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases the food production of all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT] by 1.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]生物学[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_REVERT]而无需[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]灌溉[COLOR_REVERT]设施。并使所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_REVERT]产出+1。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Medicine[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospital[COLOR_REVERT] city improvement and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]医学[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]建筑和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Electricity[COLOR_REVERT] improves the output of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmills[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermills[COLOR_REVERT]. It allows construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunkers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT], and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadway[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]电学[COLOR_REVERT]可提升[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]风力磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]水力磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]的产出。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地堡[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]百老汇[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Combustion[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to construct [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Transport[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radio[COLOR_REVERT]) naval units. It enables your workers to build the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Well[COLOR_REVERT] improvement on land-based [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] resources and obsoletes the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whale[COLOR_REVERT] resource.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]内燃机[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输舰[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]无线电[COLOR_REVERT]）海军单位。并允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]深井[COLOR_REVERT]设施以获取陆上[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]资源并使[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]资源过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fission[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Manhattan Project[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]核裂变[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]曼哈顿工程[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fiber Optics[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part and [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]The Internet[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]光纤[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船驾驶舱[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件和[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]因特网[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusion[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engine[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part. The first to discover this tech receives a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]核聚变[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船发动机[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件。首先发现该科技的文明可获得一位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Flight[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carriers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT], and other air units (with additional techs). It also enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]航空[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]和其他空中单位（需要相应科技）。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Plastics[COLOR_REVERT] enables [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT] to construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Offshore Platforms[COLOR_REVERT]. It also lets you build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[COLOR_REVERT] wonder, and obsoletes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]塑料[COLOR_REVERT]允许[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工船[COLOR_REVERT]修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海上平台[COLOR_REVERT]。并允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]奇观，并使[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]毛皮[COLOR_REVERT]过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Composites[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Modern Armor[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Computers[COLOR_REVERT]), [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jet Fighters[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Robotics[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]复合材料[COLOR_REVERT]允许组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]主战坦克[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]计算机[COLOR_REVERT]）、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]喷气式战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]隐形轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]机器人[COLOR_REVERT]）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Genetics[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the health of your cities. It allows you to build the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]遗传学[COLOR_REVERT]可极大提升城市的健康度。并允许你建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船休眠舱[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Hunting[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scouts[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT] units. It also enables your workers to build the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camp[COLOR_REVERT] improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]捕猎[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位。并允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]猎场[COLOR_REVERT]设施。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mining[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mines[COLOR_REVERT] on hills and certain resources, which increase your cities' production output.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]采矿[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人在丘陵特定资源上修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]矿井[COLOR_REVERT]，可以提升城市的生产能力。

TEXT.English: This important early technology allows you to construct the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT] unit, and, later on, the more powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowman[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这个重要的早期科技允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓手[COLOR_REVERT]单位，以后还可组建更强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长弓手[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手[COLOR_REVERT]，以及[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Masonry[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quarry[COLOR_REVERT] improvements. It also enables construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT] city improvements, as well as the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]石工术[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]采石场[COLOR_REVERT]设施。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]建筑，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大金字塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bronze Working[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] resource and allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axemen[COLOR_REVERT]. It enables the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slavery[COLOR_REVERT] civic and lets your workers chop down forests.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]青铜器[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]资源并允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]斧兵[COLOR_REVERT]。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]奴隶制度[COLOR_REVERT]法令并允许你的工人砍伐森林。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Animal Husbandry[COLOR_REVERT] allows your workers to build the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pasture[COLOR_REVERT] improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]动物驯养[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧场[COLOR_REVERT]设施。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Iron Working[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource and allows construction of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] unit. It also allows your workers to cut down jungles.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]铁器[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源并允许建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]单位。并允许你的工人清理丛林。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Metal Casting[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT], which increase city production. It also enables the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] wonder, and lets your workers build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Workshop[COLOR_REVERT] improvements.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]金属铸造[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]，可提升城市生产力。并启用[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]奇观，并允许你的工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工场[COLOR_REVERT]设施。

TEXT.English: This tech allows you to build the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] unit and the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT]). It also enables [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseums[COLOR_REVERT], and your units no longer lose movement when crossing rivers on roads.
TEXT.Chinese: 该科技允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石车[COLOR_REVERT]单位和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战象[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]）。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，并使你的单位在沿道路渡河时不消耗移动力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horseback Riding[COLOR_REVERT] enables the powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT]) unit, and later on [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Guilds[COLOR_REVERT]) and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]骑术[COLOR_REVERT]启用强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑射手[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]弓箭[COLOR_REVERT]）单位，及以后的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]行会[COLOR_REVERT]）和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]军事制度[COLOR_REVERT]）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] allows your cities to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorers[COLOR_REVERT] and build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] and leads to other naval technologies.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]罗盘[COLOR_REVERT]允许你的城市组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_REVERT]并可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]并通向其他航海科技。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Machinery[COLOR_REVERT] allows the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Maceman[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Civil Service[COLOR_REVERT]) and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Archery[COLOR_REVERT]). It also lets workers build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmills[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermills[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]机械[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]钉锤手[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]文官制度[COLOR_REVERT]）和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]弓箭[COLOR_REVERT]）。并允许工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]风力磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]水力磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] allows production of the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT], excellent against mounted units. It increases road movement and allows construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]工程学[COLOR_REVERT]允许组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]，适于对抗骑乘单位。并可提升道路通行能力并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT], and allows your [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT] to harvest [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whale[COLOR_REVERT] resources. [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT] also increases your sight distance across water.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]光学[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻帆船[COLOR_REVERT]，并允许你的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工船[COLOR_REVERT]获取[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]资源。[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]光学[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升海上视野。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gunpowder[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT] units and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]火药[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]单位和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]军事制度[COLOR_REVERT]）。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Replaceable Parts[COLOR_REVERT] enables workers to produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumbermills[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases the production output of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmills[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermills[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]可更换部件[COLOR_REVERT]允许工人修建[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]锯木场[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]风力磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]水力磨坊[COLOR_REVERT]的产能。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT] enables [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] units and is required to build many other powerful modern units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]膛线[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]来复枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位也是组建其他强大的现代单位的前提。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steam Power[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT] resource and causes workers to build improvements 50%% faster. It also enables the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclad[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steel[COLOR_REVERT]) and obsoletes the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]蒸汽机[COLOR_REVERT]启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤炭[COLOR_REVERT]资源并使工人修建设施速度+50%%。并启用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]铁甲舰[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]炼钢[COLOR_REVERT]）并使[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]奇观过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steel[COLOR_REVERT] enables you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclads[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Steam Power[COLOR_REVERT]). It also enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]炼钢[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]铁甲舰[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]蒸汽机[COLOR_REVERT]）。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]建筑和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Gun[COLOR_REVERT] units. Most importantly, with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT] it allows your workers to upgrade your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Railroads[COLOR_REVERT], vastly increasing your units' movement.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]铁路[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重机枪[COLOR_REVERT]单位。而且，如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤炭[COLOR_REVERT]你的工人可将[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道路[COLOR_REVERT]升级为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁路[COLOR_REVERT]，大大提升单位移动能力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT], powerful mid-game siege units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]火炮[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火炮[COLOR_REVERT]，游戏中期的强大压制单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Assembly Line[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT]). It also enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT] building and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]生产流水线[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]现代步兵[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]膛线[COLOR_REVERT]）。并允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]建筑和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Industrialism[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Battleships[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marines[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT]), and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT]). It also reveals the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminum[COLOR_REVERT] resource and obsoletes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]产业主义[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战列舰[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]海军陆战队[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]膛线[COLOR_REVERT]）和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]坦克[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]膛线[COLOR_REVERT]）。并启用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铝[COLOR_REVERT]资源及使[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Radio[COLOR_REVERT] enables the powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bomber[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Flight[COLOR_REVERT]) and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Combustion[COLOR_REVERT]) units. It also allows you to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rock N Roll[COLOR_REVERT] wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]无线电[COLOR_REVERT]启用强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]航空[COLOR_REVERT]）和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]内燃机[COLOR_REVERT]）单位。并允许你建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摇滚名人堂[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Refrigeration[COLOR_REVERT] allows construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT] building. It also increases your water units' movement speed.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]致冷[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级市场[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。并提升海上单位的移动能力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Computers[COLOR_REVERT] enables construction of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lab[COLOR_REVERT] building. It also obsoletes [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Angkor Wat[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]计算机[COLOR_REVERT]允许建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]建筑。并使[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]过时。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rocketry[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]SAM Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT]), [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunship[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Flight[COLOR_REVERT]), and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT] (with [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fission[COLOR_REVERT]). It enables the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Apollo Program[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder and construction of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casing[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]火箭[COLOR_REVERT]允许你建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]防空步兵[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]膛线[COLOR_REVERT]）、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]武装直升机[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]航空[COLOR_REVERT]）和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战略导弹[COLOR_REVERT]（需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]核裂变[COLOR_REVERT]）。并启用[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]阿波罗计划[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观和建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船外壳[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Satellites[COLOR_REVERT] reveals the world map. It lets you build the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part and enables construction of the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]人造卫星[COLOR_REVERT]使整个世界地图可见。允许你建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船推进器[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件并允许建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]战略导弹防御系统[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Robotics[COLOR_REVERT] enables the extremely powerful [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanized Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] units. It lets you build the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT] spaceship part and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]机器人[COLOR_REVERT]启用极其强大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]机械化步兵[COLOR_REVERT]单位。并允许你建造[COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]飞船对接舱[COLOR_REVERT]太空船组件和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]奇观。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Future Tech[COLOR_REVERT] increases health and happiness in your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]未来科技[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的健康度和快乐度。

TEXT.English: The most primitive Government civic
TEXT.Chinese: 最原始的政府体制

TEXT.English: Military units in cities increase happiness
TEXT.Chinese: 城市驻军可提升快乐度

TEXT.English: Extra happiness in largest cities; extra research from city specialists
TEXT.Chinese: 大城市增加额外快乐度；专业人员增加额外科研点

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production; less war anger
TEXT.Chinese: 加快军事单位建造速度；减少厌战情绪

TEXT.English: Can spend gold to finish production; extra production from towns
TEXT.Chinese: 可以金钱代价加速生产；城镇增加额外生产能力

TEXT.English: The most primitive Legal civic
TEXT.Chinese: 最原始的法律制度

TEXT.English: New units receive free experience points; lower unit support costs
TEXT.Chinese: 新单位自动获得经验点；降低单位维持费

TEXT.English: Increases production and commerce in your capital city
TEXT.Chinese: 增加首都的生产能力和商业收入

TEXT.English: Can draft three units per turn; barracks produce extra happiness
TEXT.Chinese: 每回合可以强制征召三个单位；兵营增加额外快乐度

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from towns; increases cultural output of all cities
TEXT.Chinese: 城镇增加额外商业收入；增加所有城市的文化积累

TEXT.English: The most primitive Labor civic
TEXT.Chinese: 最原始的劳工制度

TEXT.English: Can sacrifice city population to finish production
TEXT.Chinese: 可以牺牲人口为代价加速建造

TEXT.English: Workers build improvements faster
TEXT.Chinese: 工人更有效率

TEXT.English: You may assign unlimited artist, scientist, and merchant specialists in your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 可以不受数量限制地供养艺术家，科学家和商业家。

TEXT.English: Causes unhappiness in civilizations without emancipation; cottages develop faster
TEXT.Chinese: 使无人身自由的文明人民感到不满；农舍成长更快速

TEXT.English: The most primitive Economy civic
TEXT.Chinese: 最原始的经济制度

TEXT.English: Free specialist in each city but no foreign trade routes
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市的专业人员免费，但没有国际贸易线路

TEXT.English: Extra trade route in each city
TEXT.Chinese: 每座城市增加额外贸易线路

TEXT.English: No maintenance penalty for distance to Palace; increased food production from workshops and watermills
TEXT.Chinese: 取消遥远地区的维护费惩罚；增加来自工场和水力磨坊的食物产出

TEXT.English: Extra health in all cities; nearby forests and jungles make citizens happier
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市增加额外健康度；附近的森林和丛林增加市民快乐度

TEXT.English: The most primitive Religion civic
TEXT.Chinese: 最原始的宗教制度

TEXT.English: Can build missionaries without monasteries; cities with state religion construct buildings faster
TEXT.Chinese: 无须修道院即可组建传教士单位；信仰国教的城市建造速度更快

TEXT.English: No spread of non-state religion; new units receive free experience points in cities with state religion
TEXT.Chinese: 禁止非官方信仰传播；信仰国教的城市所组建的单位免费获得经验点

TEXT.English: Increases great people birth rate in cities with state religion; increases support costs for military units
TEXT.Chinese: 增加信仰国教的城市的历史伟人出现几率；增加军事单位的维持费用

TEXT.English: No state religion. Happiness from all religions in each city; increased scientific research
TEXT.Chinese: 没有官方信仰。城市可因任何信仰而增加快乐度；提加科研点数

TEXT.English: A component of a space ship, required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition.
TEXT.Chinese: 太空飞船组件之一，用于实现[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]太空胜利[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Enables [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] for all players.
TEXT.Chinese: 所有玩家可建造[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战略导弹[COLOR_REVERT]与[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Grants the builder all technologies that are already discovered by 2 known civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: 建造者自动获得所有已被两个文明发现的科技。

TEXT.English: +75%% chance of intercepting [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: +75%%几率拦截[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战略导弹[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Required to build any spaceship parts.
TEXT.Chinese: 用于建造太空飞船组件。

TEXT.English: The city containing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace[COLOR_REVERT] is the capital of your civilization and city maintenance is decreased in cities near it. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace[COLOR_REVERT] generates culture and a small amount of commerce.
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]的城市是文明的首都，其他城市维护费的高低由距离首都的远近决定。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]能产生文化和少量商业收入。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities; it also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费；并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities and acts like a second [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases the chances of creating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费，相当于第二座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. Build them in cities under threat from enemy or barbarian assault.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力。建造城墙可抵御敌国或蛮族的攻击。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your city's defenses aganst pre-gunpowder units and generate a small amount of culture. Build them in cities near enemy civilizations.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力，并能积累少量文化值。可在边境城市建造。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to troops built in their cities. Build them in all cities that will produce military units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市组建的单位提供经验值。可在所有需要组建军事单位的城市建造。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunkers[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from air attacks. Build them when (or before!) your enemies have strong air forces.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地堡[COLOR_REVERT]减少空中单位造成的破坏。可在敌方拥有强大空军时（或之前！）建造。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from nuclear attacks. These should be built in your most important cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]减少核打击造成的破坏。应在重要的城市建造。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate. They add additional health if your civ has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]储存食物，加速城市成长。在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]资源的情况下可提升城市健康度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT] improves a city's health and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] wonder. Build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueducts[COLOR_REVERT] when you want to grow a city, or when the populace begins clamoring for it.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。如希望城市进一步发展可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，或在居民提出要求时再建造。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] help units heal damage more quickly and add health to a city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助单位恢复战斗力，并提升城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Centers[COLOR_REVERT] eliminate pollution from city improvements like [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT], which can become a real problem in larger metropolises.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]回收中心[COLOR_REVERT]可消除城市设施带来的污染，例如[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工场[COLOR_REVERT]，污染问题在大城市中相当严重。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] improves the food output of water plots. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可提升水域的食物产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT] increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市来自商路的收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]资源还可提升城市健康度。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] are very useful when you are involved in naval warfare. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] build ships much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points, but [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness in cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]在你卷入海战时将非常有用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]能更快地建造舰船，并提供额外经验点，但[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, and a city with an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airport[COLOR_REVERT] can airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness in cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市商路增加，拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]的城市可空运单位。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT] allows a city to produce units and buildings faster, but also adds unhealthiness in cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的生产能力，但也会影响城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT], which add additional production with the proper resources.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市生产力，但会显著影响健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]的前提，在拥有相应资源的情况下能提升生产力。

TEXT.English: Coal Plants provide power for the Factory, although the pollution will hurt your city's health.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]为工厂提供电力，但其造成的污染会影响城市健康度。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力，且不会造成污染。

TEXT.English: With access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide power for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]的情况下，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]可为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisks[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture, and are a good way to expand city borders early on.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]可产生少量文化值，是早期扩展城市边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research as well as its cultural output.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科学院[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力以及文化产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your cities' research and provide culture. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] wonder, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] national wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]促进城市的科研并提供文化产出。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's research and provides culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的科研能力并产生文化值。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's scientific research. It is required to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市科研能力。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research and its spaceship production, but also add unhealthiness.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力及太空飞船建造能力，但也会影响健康度。

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's culture and increases the happiness output from using the culture slider. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] also provides culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市文化值，并可通过文化滑杆调整快乐度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]也是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市快乐度，并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increases the happiness output from using the culture slider.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市文化产出。并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]毛皮[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丝绸[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市快乐度。

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's wealth. It also increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]食糖[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]酒类[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市健康度。

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's production of wealth. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wall Street[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市商业收入。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
