TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT] increase the health of cities, if the cities have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]野鹿[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牛群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]家猪[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绵羊[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升其效果。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs and are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] help manage the cost of controlling large empires.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市维护费，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助维持广阔的帝国。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT]. Build them if you are involved in a long war and your citizens are starting to complain.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]减少城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战情绪[COLOR_REVERT]。可在要卷入长期战争时，或在市民提出要求时建造。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Synagogue[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教会堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]为官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所罗门圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Christian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]基督教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]基督教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Nativity[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Christian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣诞大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]基督教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊斯兰清真寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊斯兰大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克尔白天房[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊斯兰教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandir[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教神殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kashi Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教黄金殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupa[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大菩提寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Academy[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]书院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Miao[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孔庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Pagoda[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道宫[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dai Miao[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]岱庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's production when creating military units. This is useful if you expect to do a lot of fighting. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]使城市组建军事单位的速度加倍。如果你经常卷入战争则会非常需要。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the rate at which its city produces [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhappiness from the city in which it is built. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]可消除所在城市的所有不满。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hermitage[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冬宫[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的文化产出加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to change three citizens into scientists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升所在城市的科研能力。并允许你供养三位科学家，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wall Street[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's production of wealth and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的商业收入加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also add unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市生产能力（如果城市拥有煤炭或铁），但也会影响健康度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: All military units built in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point's[COLOR_REVERT] city begin with four additional experience points. Further, its city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 在拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西点军校[COLOR_REVERT]的城市组建的军事单位拥有四个初始经验点。此外，该城市有更大的几率产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built in its city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市组建的单位获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]医疗一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Scotland Yard[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train the special [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT] unit, which is good for scouting out enemy cities and territory. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]允许你训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]单位，适用于探查敌方城市和领土。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] enable you to access all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Government[COLOR_REVERT] civics (greatly increasing your early management options). They also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大金字塔[COLOR_REVERT]允许你实行任何[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政府体制[COLOR_REVERT]类政策法令（大大增加游戏早期的政策选择）。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT] in all your cities and centers the world map. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨石阵[COLOR_REVERT]可免费为你的所有城市提供一座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free scientist specialists, increasing the city's scientific output. It greatly increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在城市免费供养两位科学家，提升城市的科研能力。并能大大提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] adds two additional trade routes to all coastal cities. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有海滨城市额外增加两条商路。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] improves the health of your cities and adds an additional population point in them. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并额外增加一个人口点数。还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in your coastal cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]可使本国海滨城市的水域额外增加一个单位的商业产出。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives the builder one free technology advance, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]可使建造者免费获得两项科技，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT]. It also has a high cultural value.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神殿[COLOR_REVERT]可提升你的文明产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可大量增加文化产出。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Angkor Wat[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to turn 3 citizens into priests in the city that builds the wonder. Further, it adds additional production to all of your priest specialists. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Angkor Wat[COLOR_REVERT] increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]允许所在城市供养三位神学家。此外还可促进本国所有神学家的作用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] causes your workers to build improvements much faster, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]可使你的工人效率更高，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chichen Itza[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%%. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophets[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]奇琴伊察[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市的防御能力+25%%。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] has a very high cultural value, and it increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: If you have a state religion, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] causes all of that religion's buildings to generate gold for your civilizatiion. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你设定了国教，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可使所有宗教建筑产生金钱收入。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness of all of your cities built on the same continent. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]提升同一大陆所有城市的快乐度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Building the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins an immediate [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]可立即触发本文明的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金时代[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the cost of hurrying production and it increases its city's chances of generating [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] puts a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得一位专业人员。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadway[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Musicals[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]百老汇[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门音乐剧[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rock-n-Roll[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摇滚名人堂[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent, which is needed to increase the production of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]可为同一大陆的所有城市提供无污染的电力，用于提升[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]的生产能力。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Once the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] is built, all new units built in your civilization receive two experience points. Its city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]用于进行触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交胜利[COLOR_REVERT]的选举。可确保你作为此项选举的候选者之一，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities by 50%%, and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市建造太空飞船组件的速度+50%%，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。

TEXT.English: Focusing on wealth turns production into commerce within that particular city.
TEXT.Chinese: 专注于财富积累可将特定城市的生产能力转化为商业收入。

TEXT.English: Focusing on research converts production into research within that particular city.
TEXT.Chinese: 专注于科技研究可将特定城市的生产能力转化为科研点数。

TEXT.English: Focusing on culture converts production into culture within that particular city.
TEXT.Chinese: 专注于文化发展可将特定城市的生产能力转化为文化点数。

TEXT.English: Use your mouse wheel to zoom
TEXT.Chinese: 使用鼠标滚轮可改变镜头远近

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + I] to play with a minimized interface. Press [ALT-I] to play with no interface.
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + I] 简化操作界面. 按 [ALT + I] 隐藏操作界面.

TEXT.English: You can use the mouse wheel or [PAGE UP] and [PAGE DOWN] to zoom the camera in and out...
TEXT.Chinese: 除了用鼠标滚轮, 用 [PAGE UP] 和 [PAGE DOWN] (翻页键) 也可改变镜头远近...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + S] to Save the Game and [CTRL + L] to Load a saved game...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + S] 保存游戏 [CTRL + L] 加载存档...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + (LEFT ARROW)] or [CTRL + (RIGHT ARROW)] to rotate and set the camera by 45 degrees...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + (左方向键)] 或 [CTRL + (右方向键)] 可改变镜头角度...

TEXT.English: Double clicking on a stack of units will group them together...
TEXT.Chinese: 双击重叠的单位可将其全部群组...

TEXT.English: Hold down ALT and click on a stack to select all units...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [ALT] 点击重叠单位可将其全部选中...

TEXT.English: Hold down CTRL and click on a stack to select all units of the same type...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [CTRL] 点击重叠的单位以选择同类型单位...

TEXT.English: With multiple units selected, you can give the group orders that they will conduct together.
TEXT.Chinese: 选中多个单位后下达命令, 单位将同时行动.

TEXT.English: Right clicking on a transport will automatically load the units onto it...
TEXT.Chinese: 选中单位后右键点击运输舰船, 单位将自动上船...

TEXT.English: With a transport selected, right clicking on an adjacent land square will automatically unload the units...
TEXT.Chinese: 选中运输舰船后右键点击相邻地块, 单位将自动下船...

TEXT.English: Press [F12] to access the Civilopedia...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [F12] 可打开文明百科...

TEXT.English: Press [PRINT SCREEN] to take a screenshot (It will be saved in your Civ4\Screenshots folder)...
TEXT.Chinese: 除了用鼠标滚轮, 用 [PAGE UP] 和 [PAGE DOWN] (翻页键) 也可改变镜头远近...

TEXT.English: Press [ESC] to bring up the in-game Options Menu...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [ESC] 可打开游戏内部选项菜单...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + O] to bring up the Options Menu...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + O] 可打开游戏选项菜单...

TEXT.English: Press the middle mouse button to center the camera on the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: 按鼠标中键可使选定单位居中显示...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + F5] (Single Player Only) to Quick Save...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [SHIFT + F5] (仅单人游戏) 可快速存档...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + F8] (Single Player Only) to Quick Load...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [SHIFT + F8] (仅单人游戏) 可快速加载...

TEXT.English: Press [P] to ping the map and provide info to teammates...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [P] 可标记地图并向队友传递信息...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + # key] to bind the selected unit to that # key. For example: [CTRL + 3] would make it so anytime 3 is pressed, that unit is automatically selected...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + (数字键)] 可将选定单位编号. 点击相应数字键可快速选择单位...

TEXT.English: While in the city screen, press [CTRL + # key] to save the production queue. This queue can be loaded in any other city by pressing the # key...
TEXT.Chinese: 在城市界面中, 按 [CTRL+(数字键)] 可保存建造序列. 点击相应数字键可在其他城市中加载建造序列...

TEXT.English: Press [F11] to quickly switch in and out of Globe View...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [F11] 快速切换全球视图...

TEXT.English: While in the city screen, you can use [LEFT ARROW] and [RIGHT ARROW] to cycle between cities...
TEXT.Chinese: 在城市界面中, 可用 [左方向键] 和 [右方向键] 循环切换城市...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + B] to toggle Bare Map view...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + B] 切换纯地图视图...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + R] to toggle Flag Resources view...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + R] 切换标记资源视图...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + Y] to toggle Show Yields view...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + Y] 切换区域产出视图...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + A] to force all units with queued orders to move...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + A] 强制所有单位按排列顺序移动...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + T] to toggle the Tile Grid
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + T] 切换区域网格

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + Q] to retire from the game. In multiplayer this automatically gives control of your Civilization to an AI...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [ALT + Q] 从游戏中引退. 在多人游戏中你的文明将由电脑接管...

TEXT.English: Press [PAUSE] to interrupt the Turn Timer...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [PAUSE] 暂停回合计时器...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + TAB] to chat to All in multiplayer...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [SHIFT + TAB] 在多人游戏中与所有人交谈...

TEXT.English: Press [ TAB ] to chat to teammates in Multiplayer...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [ TAB ] 在多人游戏中与队友交谈...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + W] to access the Worldbuilder...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + W] 进入世界创建器...

TEXT.English: Press [W] or [ENTER] to cycle through your active units...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [W] 或 [ENTER] 循环切换你的活动单位...

TEXT.English: Press [/] to scroll though active workers...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [/] 循环切换活动工人...

TEXT.English: Press [COMMA] and [PERIOD] to scroll though units on the same square...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [,] 和 [.] 循环切换同一区块的单位...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + ENTER] to force the turn to end...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [SHIFT + ENTER] 强制结束回合...

TEXT.English: Hold down the ALT key while mousing-over a plot to view the combat odds for an attack...
TEXT.Chinese: 鼠标停留在区块上时按住 [ALT] 键可查看攻击的战力对比...

TEXT.English: To view combat odds, hold down the right mouse button on the target tile...
TEXT.Chinese: 要查看战力对比, 在目标区块上按下鼠标右键...

TEXT.English: Press [HOME] and [END] to cycle through your cities...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [HOME] 和 [END] 循环切换城市...

TEXT.English: Press [INSERT] to open up the nearest friendly city...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [INSERT] 打开最近的友好城市...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [SHIFT] key to add items to the end of your city's build queue...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [SHIFT] 在城市建造序列的末尾添加项目...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [CTRL] key to insert items at the beginning of your city's build queue...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [CTRL] 在城市建造序列的头部添加项目...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [ALT] key to have a city build an item indefinitely...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [ALT] 点击令城市重复建造同一项目...

TEXT.English: Press the forward and back buttons on your mouse to cycle through units on the same plot...
TEXT.Chinese: 按鼠标上的前后按钮循环切换同一区块的单位...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [CTRL] key and spin the mouse-wheel to cycle through units on the same plot...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [CTRL] 转动鼠标滚轮循环切换同一区块的单位...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + M] to toggle the music on and off...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + M] 切换背景音乐播放和停止...

TEXT.English: Move units to a distant tile by right-clicking on it...
TEXT.Chinese: 鼠标右键单击目标区块移动单位...

TEXT.English: You can group move all units of the same type by a [CTRL + RIGHT-CLICK] on the destination...
TEXT.Chinese: [CTRL + 鼠标右击] 集体移动同一区块相同类型的单位...

TEXT.English: You can group move all units on the same tile by a [ALT + RIGHT-CLICK] on the destination...
TEXT.Chinese: [ALT + 鼠标右击] 集体移动同一区块所有的单位...

TEXT.English: Enter "Go-To" Mode by pressing [G]...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [G] 进入“前往”模式...

TEXT.English: Enter "Go-To (Same Unit Type)" Mode by pressing [CTRL + G]...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + G] 进入“前往(相同类型单位)”模式...

TEXT.English: Enter "Go-To (All Units)" Mode by pressing [ALT + G]...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [ALT + G] 进入“前往(所有单位)”模式...

TEXT.English: Press [C] to center the camera on the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [C] 使镜头对正活动单位...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + C] to select all units of the same type as the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + C] 选中同一区块同一类型的单位...

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + C] to select all units on the same tile as the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [ALT + C] 选中同一区块所有的单位...

TEXT.English: If you hold down the [SHIFT] key while clicking on the city bar, you can "select" multiple cities - allowing you to change production in multiple cities. You can also [SHIFT + RIGHT-CLICK] to set a rally point.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果按住 [SHIFT] 键点击城市状态条, 可以“选中”多座城市——同时修改其建造项目. 还可以用 [SHIFT + 鼠标右击] 设置其集合点.

TEXT.English: If you hold down the [CTRL] key while clicking on the city bar, you will "select" all of your cities on that continent.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果按住 [CTRL] 键点击城市状态条, 可以“选中”同一大陆的所有本国城市.

TEXT.English: If you hold down the [ALT] key while clicking on the city bar, you will "select" all of your cities in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果按住 [ALT] 键点击城市状态条, 可以“选中”全球的所有本国城市.

TEXT.English: Press the middle mouse button to exit the city screen...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 鼠标中键 退出城市界面...

TEXT.English: You can give a unit consecutive orders by pressing the SHIFT key. For example, you could tell a worker to build a road and then a mine by clicking on both buttons while holding down SHIFT...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [SHIFT] 键可对单位下达连续命令. 例如, 命令某个工人单位先建造一条道路, 再修建一个矿井...

TEXT.English: Hold down SHIFT and click on a tile to open a context menu...
TEXT.Chinese: 按住 [SHIFT] 点击区块可打开弹出菜单...

TEXT.English: The NUMPAD arrow keys can be used to jump between cities when the city screen is up...
TEXT.Chinese: 在城市界面中可用 小键盘方向键 循环切换城市...

TEXT.English: Press [\] to jump back to the last selected unit...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [\] 返回上次选择的单位...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + TAB] to view the turn event log...
TEXT.Chinese: 按 [CTRL + TAB] 查看回合事件记录...

TEXT.English: Entering native villages with scouts will produce better results...
TEXT.Chinese: 派侦察兵进入部落村庄更容易获得有利的结果...

TEXT.English: Be aware of the strengths and weaknesses of units. For instance, Axemen get a bonus vs units like Swords and Spears; Swords get a bonus when attacking cities; Spears get a bonus vs units like Chariots.
TEXT.Chinese: 注意不同单位的优势和弱点。例如，斧兵对剑士和矛兵有优势；剑士在进攻城市时有优势；矛兵在对抗战车时有优势。

TEXT.English: A good time to check for trading possibilities with another civilization is right after researching a new technology - shop around and see what you can get for it before others beat you to it!
TEXT.Chinese: 发明一项新科技时是与其他文明进行贸易的好机会——抢在对手前面四处兜售以获取利益!

TEXT.English: Guard your experienced units! A veteran unit with older weaponry can often defeat a new unit with more advanced equipment.
TEXT.Chinese: 重视高经验值的单位！一个装备旧式武器的资深单位往往能击败装备先进武器的新组建单位。

TEXT.English: New civics are not always better civics! Don't switch automatically. Weigh your options; consider your needs and priorities.
TEXT.Chinese: 更新的内政法令不一定更好！不要随便改行新政策。而要认真权衡利弊；以适合国情为标准。

TEXT.English: Balance your research. Spending too much time on one type of research leads to long research times. Neglecting cheaper, older technologies can cost you.
TEXT.Chinese: 平衡发展科技。过多专注于单一门类的研究会耗费过多时间。忽视便宜和较旧的科技可能使你付出代价。

TEXT.English: Units cost money in maintenance - don't use fifty when fifteen will do.
TEXT.Chinese: 单位需要支出维持费——不要始终维持过于庞大的军队。

TEXT.English: Never despair in the face of a large stack of units. Catapults may not beat cavalry, but you can still do a lot of damage to a stack with enough of them.
TEXT.Chinese: 面对大堆敌方单位不必绝望。投石车也许对付不了骑兵，但运用投石车可以对集群单位造成严重损失。

TEXT.English: Not every city can occupy an ideal location. Some cities can be placed to acquire resources or make use of marginal terrain. Keep an eye on your cities' maintenance costs, so that you do not expand too quickly only to stifle your economy.
TEXT.Chinese: 不必每座城市都占据理想位置。有些城市的选址可以是为了获得关键资源或利用边疆土地。关注你的城市维护费支出，扩张过快可能造成不利影响。

TEXT.English: Don't always promote a unit as soon as it is possible. It may be wise to wait and see what kinds of units your opponent has before using up a promotion. Also, wounded units heal some damage when a promotion is used.
TEXT.Chinese: 不必急着立即晋升单位。明智的做法是先查看对手如何晋升其单位再做有针对性的晋升。而且受伤的单位在晋升后还可以恢复部分战斗力。

TEXT.English: An unescorted settler, galleon, or transport are all huge risks - make sure you are willing to take them!
TEXT.Chinese: 派遣移民、大帆船或运输舰而不提供保护是非常危险的——除非你可以承受这样的损失!

TEXT.English: Barbarians can appear anywhere a tile is obscured by fog of war, so never assume a tile you can't see is safe, even if you checked it the turn before!
TEXT.Chinese: 蛮族可以在战雾笼罩下的任何区域出现，即便上一轮已经侦察过的区域，也不能确定就是安全的!

TEXT.English: Check the foreign advisor often - knowing what your friends (and foes) can offer in trade is valuable information.
TEXT.Chinese: 经常查看外交顾问界面——及时了解你的朋友（或敌人）可能提供的交易项目是非常重要的。

TEXT.English: Be careful in signing Open Border agreements - make sure your "friend" isn't mapping out your land for sale to the highest bidder!
TEXT.Chinese: 签订开放边界条约要谨慎从事——要确定你的“朋友”不是想要测绘你的地图向别国兜售!

TEXT.English: Don't neglect your empire's culture - walls and castles will only work until gunpowder, but a high cultural influence boosts defense for all eras.
TEXT.Chinese: 不可忽视本国文化的发展——城墙和城堡只在火器出现之前起作用，文化影响则可以在任何时代提升防御能力。

TEXT.English: If you find a valuable resource that is too far away for you to use, it may still be smart to keep a unit on top of it, if only to find out who eventually is going to control it.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果在过于遥远的地方发现一种重要资源，派一个单位在该处驻守仍是明智的做法，至少可以知道最后是谁控制了该资源。

TEXT.English: Don't neglect cottages! They may start small, but once they mature, you'll be glad you built them.
TEXT.Chinese: 不可忽视农舍建设！虽然开始时收入有限，但随着它的成长，你会获得丰厚的回报。

TEXT.English: Take advantage of the opportunity to pillage a cottage improvement. The time required to advance each level of growth for a cottage can't be hurried, and the gold you get for pillaging them is unparalleled.
TEXT.Chinese: 要抓住机会劫掠敌人的农舍。农舍升级所需时间无法加速，劫掠农舍可以带来大笔金钱。

TEXT.English: When trying to capture a mature city, bring plenty of siege weapons. You'll want to bombard the defenses and to soften the defenders.
TEXT.Chinese: 攻打大城市前，准备好足够的压制武器。你需要通过轰炸削弱城防。

TEXT.English: Don't be afraid to attack with ranged units - archers and longbows may not be the best offensive units, but properly promoted, they can do a respectable job.
TEXT.Chinese: 投射单位也可以用来进攻——弓手和长弓手虽然不是最好的攻击型单位，但如果采用适宜的晋升，仍可以发挥重大作用。

TEXT.English: The Flanking promotion only works when you attack - so it may help to leave these units a movement point to run away if they withdraw from an attack.
TEXT.Chinese: “迂回”类晋升只在进攻时起作用——进攻时注意让单位保留一点移动力，以在进攻失败时撤退。

TEXT.English: Consider keeping one unit with the Medic promotion in every large stack - the bonus isn't cumulative, but it can make the difference in keeping an advance going.
TEXT.Chinese: 每个单位集群中应该有一个单位采用“医疗”类晋升——以及时为其他单位恢复战斗力。

TEXT.English: Never bring a sword to a gunfight.
TEXT.Chinese: 绝不要派遣剑士对付火器单位。

TEXT.English: Watch for announcements about religions being founded and wonders being completed - this can give you a hint as to how advanced your foes may be.
TEXT.Chinese: 注意有关宗教创立和奇观建造的消息——这可以使你了解对手的发展状况。

TEXT.English: If you choose to have a state religion, work diligently to spread it to all your cities. Most religious civics only work in cities where your state religion is present.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果选择设立官方信仰，就要努力将其传遍你的所有城市。大多数宗教制度类内政法令只能对奉行官方信仰的城市起作用。

TEXT.English: Open Borders agreements are invitations for your missionaries - spread your state religion quickly and take advantage of the espionage benefits! If your religion spreads widely enough, your neighbors may convert to your faith, which can boost relations.
TEXT.Chinese: 开放边界条约就是发给传教士的通行证——迅速传播你的官方信仰，利用好其带来的谍报便利！如果你的宗教广泛传播，你的邻国可能转变其官方信仰，这将大大提升双方的关系。

TEXT.English: Make sure you need every building your city creates. Cities bringing in no commerce can sometimes skip libraries, just as a city that will never see battle can skip walls and a castle.
TEXT.Chinese: 确保城市的每座建筑都发挥作用。商业收入少的城市可以不必建造图书馆，不容易受攻击的城市可以不必建造城墙和城堡。

TEXT.English: Remember that you can build only two national wonders per city. Plan ahead: don't build both the Heroic and National Epics where you will one day want an Ironworks!
TEXT.Chinese: 记住每座城市只能建造两座国家级奇观。要预先做好规划：不要把英雄史诗和民族史诗建在一起，将来你也许需要建造大铁厂!

TEXT.English: When facing a tough defender with weak units, bring overwhelming numbers. If your target survives the battle, it will have gained experience and then it will become even more dangerous!
TEXT.Chinese: 面对坚强的防守而可用单位战斗力较弱，就要准备压倒性的数量。如果对手在进攻中幸存，将会获得大量经验值，变得更难对付!

TEXT.English: Know your opponents' resources. If you see the Manhattan Project completed, it becomes vital to know who does or does not have the uranium necessary to build nuclear weapons!
TEXT.Chinese: 了解对手的资源状况。如果曼哈顿计划已经完成，了解铀的占有状况就是关乎生死的问题!

TEXT.English: Oil-based navies are a huge step up from coal-powered ironclads. If you are the first to build Destroyers, use them to prevent rivals from obtaining sea-based oil resources; protect your advantage as long as possible!
TEXT.Chinese: 煤炭动力到石油动力是海军的巨大进步。如果你率先建造了驱逐舰，就要用它来防止对手获得海上石油资源；使你尽可能长久地保持先进!

TEXT.English: A city's population growth is halted while training settlers and workers. It may be better in some cases to let a city grow before training these units.
TEXT.Chinese: 城市人口在训练移民和工人时会停止增长。应该先让城市增长到一定规模再训练此类单位。

TEXT.English: Wars are rarely won in a day. If you lack the force to capture enemy cities, consider pillaging the countryside instead. You may lure your opponent's units out of their strongholds. Even if not, a war of attrition may lead to economic advantage, and ultimately to your victory.
TEXT.Chinese: 战争很难在一天之内打完。如果你的兵力不足以占领敌方城市，可以考虑劫掠乡村。你也可以将敌人的单位诱出城市再打。消耗性的战争也可能使你获得经济利益，为胜利作出贡献。

TEXT.English: Never fight a land war in Asia.
TEXT.Chinese: 绝不要在东亚卷入一场地面战争。

TEXT.English: Snacks are good in moderation.
TEXT.Chinese: 适当吃点快餐也不错。

TEXT.English: Grains, Livestock, and Seafood not only provide resources, but also rich yields to the local city. Cities planted near two or more of these food sources will grow quickly!
TEXT.Chinese: 谷物、牲畜和海产不但是有用资源，也能为城市提供大量产出。城市范围内有两个或更多此类资源将会更迅速地成长!

TEXT.English: Scout your region! Discover what types of resources you have nearby and plan your research paths to enable you to hook up these resources sooner rather than later.
TEXT.Chinese: 注意开展侦察活动！发现附近有哪些资源，研究相应的科技以及时利用这些资源。

TEXT.English: If your enemy is too strong to tackle in the field, hide behind your city walls and buy time. Build unit types and choose promotions that will best counter the forces aligned against you.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果敌人过于强大，可以专心防守城市争取时间。根据敌军的组成建造自己的单位并选择有针对性的晋升类型。

TEXT.English: Bigger is not always better. Overexpansion can stifle your economy and your research, even while it adds to your population and production.
TEXT.Chinese: 更大不一定总是更好。过度扩张可能导致经济和科技停滞不前，虽然可以增加你的人口和产出仍会得不偿失。

TEXT.English: A civilization without currency cannot build a specialized economy nor support a growing empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 缺乏现金的国家无法发展专业化经济，也不能保持发展扩张。

TEXT.English: Wonders of the World not only provide unique benefits, they also inspire your populace. More great people will appear in cities that build ancient wonders or multiple great wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: 世界级奇观不但能提供特殊利益，还有助于开启民智。建有古老奇观或多个大奇观的城市会出现更多的历史伟人。

TEXT.English: There are many ways to make your people happy: with religion, with luxurious resources, with city improvements, with civics, with culture rate. If you lack opportunities in some areas, focus your attention on the others. Avoid having Angry citizens whenever possible!
TEXT.Chinese: 要令你的人民快乐有多种方法：宗教信仰、奢侈资源、城市建筑、内政法令以及提升文化等级等。如果你在某些方面难有作为，就专注于其他领域。尽量避免出现不满的市民!

TEXT.English: Don't neglect your navy! Especially in the late game. Controlling the seas can provide a decisive advantage.
TEXT.Chinese: 不可忽视海军！特别是在游戏后期。掌握制海权能带来决定性的优势。

TEXT.English: Don't neglect your air force! In the final analysis, the only way to stop enemy air attacks is to control the skies yourself. (If you lack for Oil, you may be in serious danger!)
TEXT.Chinese: 不可忽视空军！遏制敌方空中打击的唯一方法就是自己掌握制空权。（如果缺乏石油，你的国家将处于危险境地！）
